1.12.2.2.2.0:
FEATURE RELEASE adds:
 - new Teleport Cube block with its own inventory, teleports entities to or from an adjacent block - places incoming entities in boats or minecarts, great near water or rails
 - updates particle effects, textures, and redstone interaction
1.12.2.2.1.0: Add Teleport Beacon cooldown; Fix for intermittent damage taken during interdimensional teleportation
1.12.2.2.0.2: Remove HUD icon seen after teleporting
1.12.2.2.0.1:
MAJOR RELEASE includes:
 - Teleport Beacons can now be set to teleport (Sneak+Right-Click with a wand to cycle destination)
 - new Bow of Teleportation item, has advantage of storing its teleport destination independently from your wand list (Sneak+Right-Click to set)
 - new Teleport Rail block teleports minecarts
 - new Splash Potion of Teleportation II with extended range of effect
 - new particle effects
 - new wand features (Sneak+Left-Click and Sneak+Right-Click improvements - see tool tips)
 - improved handling for setting a teleport destination on a dispenser (cycles with each Sneak+Right-Click)
 - 6 new mod console commands
 - 20 new mod config options
